meanings.definition: A unicellular organism belonging to the phylum Euglenophyta.
meanings.sent1: The euglenoid swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the euglenoid under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The euglenoid wore a tiny crown made of algae for the pond party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, the euglenoid was the king of the pond.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the vibrant colors of the euglenoid as it moved.
